title: Video: PINS – Say To Me
content:
Manchester is exciting; the kids in London are still furiously masturbating to bros wearing crudely screen-printed upside-down cross tees, while Manchester simply doesn’t give a fuck.

Manchester is happy just being Manchester, eclectic, forward thinking and exciting. Step forward PINS, a four piece we’ve been excited about for a little while now. The band nestles rather comfortably between Kult Country and London’s Savages when it comes to the groups’ contemporaries. Not only do the band settle in, they also manage to excel. The new video for Say To Me, taken from PINS‘ debut EP LUVU4LYF, is a dramatic, yet perhaps slightly queasy, visual interpretation of the track. It’s demanding, uncompromising and assuming.

Assume you’ll be hearing a lot more from this lot and buy the EP here.

PINS – SAY TO ME from PINS on Vimeo.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
